title: National Merit Scholarship
description: Awarded to high school students based on their PSAT/NMSQT scores.

title: Fulbright Program
description: Provides grants for international educational exchange.

title: Gates Millennium Scholars Program
description: Provides scholarships to outstanding minority students.

title: Coca-Cola Scholars Program
description: Awards scholarships to high school seniors for college.

title: Jack Kent Cooke Foundation College Scholarship
description: Provides scholarships for high-achieving students with financial need.

title: Davis-Putter Scholarship Fund
description: Awards scholarships to students actively working for peace and justice.

title: Horatio Alger Scholarship
description: Offers scholarships to students who have overcome adversity.

title: Elks National Foundation Most Valuable Student Competition
description: Awards scholarships to high school seniors based on academic achievement.
